languages.text: "У меня крутятся твои слова в голове... о выборе, о долге, о том, что делать со своей жизнью. Считай это слабостью или духовным пороком, но я..." {n}Хейнрикс медлит, ему с трудом даются слова.{/n} "Я не хочу променять тот недолгий век, что мне остался, на служение тем, кто разменивает наши жизни как монету".

traits.locale_text: "У меня крутятся твои слова в голове... о выборе, о долге, о том, что делать со своей жизнью. Считай это слабостью или духовным пороком, но я..." {n}Хейнрикс медлит, ему с трудом даются слова.{/n} "Я не хочу променять тот век, что мне остался, на служение тем, кто разменивает наши жизни как монету".

languages.text: "Your words have been rolling around inside my head... about choice, duty, what to do with my life. I don't know if it's weakness or a spiritual defect, but I..." {n}Heinrix pauses, struggling to find the words.{/n} "I don't want to give up the short span I have left serving people who squander our lives like coins."
languages.original_text: "У меня крутятся твои слова в голове... о выборе, о долге, о том, что делать со своей жизнью. Считай это слабостью или духовным пороком, но я..." {n}Хейнрикс медлит, ему с трудом даются слова.{/n} "Я не хочу променять тот недолгий век, что мне остался, на служение тем, кто разменивает наши жизни как монету".

I don't know if it's weakness or a spiritual defect, but I..." {n}Heinrix pauses, struggling to find the words.{/n} "I don't want to give up the short span I have left serving people who squander our lives like coins."

I don't know if it's weakness or a spiritual defect, but I..." {n}Heinrix pauses, struggling to find the words.{/n} "I don't want to give up the short span I have left serving people who squander our lives like coins."

"Your words have been rolling around inside my head... about choice, duty, what to do with my life. I don't know if it's weakness or a spiritual defect, but I..." {n}Heinrix pauses, struggling to find the words.{/n} "I don't want to give up the short span I have left serving people who squander our lives like coins."

"Your words have been rolling around inside my head... about choice, duty, what to do with my life. I don't know if it's weakness or a spiritual defect, but I..." {n}Heinrix pauses, struggling to find the words.{/n} "I don't want to give up the short span I have left serving people who squander our lives like coins."

languages.text: “你的话一直在我脑海中回响……关于选择，关于责任，关于我该如何度过我的人生。我不知道这是软弱，还是精神方面的缺陷，可我……”{n}海因里希顿了顿，一时找不到合适的话语。{/n}“我已经时日无多。那些人像挥霍金钱一样挥霍我们的生命，我不打算将宝贵的时光继续用来服侍他们。”
languages.original_text: "Your words have been rolling around inside my head... about choice, duty, what to do with my life. I don't know if it's weakness or a spiritual defect, but I..." {n}Heinrix pauses, struggling to find the words.{/n} "I don't want to give up the short span I have left serving people who squander our lives like coins."

traits.locale_text: “你的话一直在我脑海中回响……关于选择，关于责任，关于我该如何度过我的人生。我不知道这是软弱，还是精神方面的缺陷，可我……”{n}海因里希顿了顿，一时找不到合适的话语。{/n}“我已经时日无多。那些人像挥霍金钱一样挥霍我们的生命，我不打算将宝贵的时光继续用来服侍他们。”

languages.text: «Sus palabras resuenan en mi mente... sobre la elección, el deber y qué hacer con mi vida. Ni sé si es por debilidad o una carencia espiritual, pero...». {n}Heinrix hace una pausa, buscando las palabras.{/n} «No quiero gastar la poca vida que me queda al servicio de gente que desperdicia nuestras vidas como si fueran monedas».
languages.original_text: "Your words have been rolling around inside my head... about choice, duty, what to do with my life. I don't know if it's weakness or a spiritual defect, but I..." {n}Heinrix pauses, struggling to find the words.{/n} "I don't want to give up the short span I have left serving people who squander our lives like coins."

traits.locale_text: «Sus palabras resuenan en mi mente... sobre la elección, el deber y qué hacer con mi vida. Ni sé si es por debilidad o una carencia espiritual, pero...». {n}Heinrix hace una pausa, buscando las palabras.{/n} «No quiero gastar la poca vida que me queda al servicio de gente que desperdicia nuestras vidas como si fueran monedas».

languages.text: 「あなたの言葉が頭の中をグルグル回っている…選択について、義務について、人生をどうすべきかについて。それが弱さなのか、精神的な欠陥なのかはわからない。だが…」{n}ハインリックスは言葉を見つけるのに苦労し、黙り込む。{/n}「俺たちの人生をコインのように浪費する人々のために、残された短い時間を捧げたくはないんだ」
languages.original_text: "Your words have been rolling around inside my head... about choice, duty, what to do with my life. I don't know if it's weakness or a spiritual defect, but I..." {n}Heinrix pauses, struggling to find the words.{/n} "I don't want to give up the short span I have left serving people who squander our lives like coins."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの言葉が頭の中をグルグル回っている…選択について、義務について、人生をどうすべきかについて。それが弱さなのか、精神的な欠陥なのかはわからない。だが…」{n}ハインリックスは言葉を見つけるのに苦労し、黙り込む。{/n}「俺たちの人生をコインのように浪費する人々のために、残された短い時間を捧げたくはないんだ」

languages.text: « Je ressassais ce que vous m'avez dit... sur le choix, le devoir et ce que je pouvais faire de ma vie. Je ne sais pas si c'est une faiblesse ou un défaut psychique, mais j'ai... » {n}Heinrix marque une pause le temps de trouver ses mots.{/n} « Je ne veux pas gâcher le peu de temps qu'il me reste à servir des gens qui se servent de nous comme de pions que l'on peut sacrifier. »
languages.original_text: "Your words have been rolling around inside my head... about choice, duty, what to do with my life. I don't know if it's weakness or a spiritual defect, but I..." {n}Heinrix pauses, struggling to find the words.{/n} "I don't want to give up the short span I have left serving people who squander our lives like coins."

traits.locale_text: « Je ressassais ce que vous m'avez dit... sur le choix, le devoir et ce que je pouvais faire de ma vie. Je ne sais pas si c'est une faiblesse ou un défaut psychique, mais j'ai... » {n}Heinrix marque une pause le temps de trouver ses mots.{/n} « Je ne veux pas gâcher le peu de temps qu'il me reste à servir des gens qui se servent de nous comme de pions que l'on peut sacrifier. »

languages.text: "Mir sind Eure Worte durch den Kopf gegangen ... über Entscheidungen, Pflicht und was ich mit meinem Leben anfangen soll. Ich weiß nicht, ob das eine Schwäche ist oder ob spirituell irgendwas mit mir nicht stimmt, aber ich ..." {n}Heinrix hält inne und bemüht sich um die richtigen Worte.{/n} "Ich möchte in der wenigen Zeit, die mir noch bleibt, nicht irgendwelchen Leuten dienen, die unsere Leben wie Spielgeld behandeln."
languages.original_text: "Your words have been rolling around inside my head... about choice, duty, what to do with my life. I don't know if it's weakness or a spiritual defect, but I..." {n}Heinrix pauses, struggling to find the words.{/n} "I don't want to give up the short span I have left serving people who squander our lives like coins."

Ich weiß nicht, ob das eine Schwäche ist oder ob spirituell irgendwas mit mir nicht stimmt, aber ich ..." {n}Heinrix hält inne und bemüht sich um die richtigen Worte.{/n} "Ich möchte in der wenigen Zeit, die mir noch bleibt, nicht irgendwelchen Leuten dienen, die unsere Leben wie Spielgeld behandeln."

languages.original_text: "Your words have been rolling around inside my head... about choice, duty, what to do with my life. I don't know if it's weakness or a spiritual defect, but I..." {n}Heinrix pauses, struggling to find the words.{/n} "I don't want to give up the short span I have left serving people who squander our lives like coins."

languages.text: "Seçime, vazifeye, hayatımla ne yapacağıma dair sözlerin, kafamın içinde dönüp duruyordu. Bu bir zayıflık mı yoksa ruhsal bir kusur mu bilmiyorum ama ben..." {n}Heinrix duraksıyor, sözcükleri seçmekte zorlanıyor.{/n} "Kalan kısacık vaktimi hayatlarımızı para gibi harcayanlara hizmet ederek feda etmek istemiyorum."
languages.original_text: "Your words have been rolling around inside my head... about choice, duty, what to do with my life. I don't know if it's weakness or a spiritual defect, but I..." {n}Heinrix pauses, struggling to find the words.{/n} "I don't want to give up the short span I have left serving people who squander our lives like coins."
